name: Playroom
description:
Play with everything you can see in this fun little playroom! Everything in the room can be picked up and used to make music, with different levels of success...

No levels or progression... just play. 

Features fully playable Xylophone with all 8 keys, and Bongo drums. 

CONTROLS

Left mouse button - click to pick up an item

Right mouse button - click to drop an item

RESOURCES USED

Bongo sounds
https://freesound.org/s/154682/ https://freesound.org/s/154683/

Xylophone sounds
https://freesound.org/people/DANMITCH3LL/packs/14220/
